keymap.localizedValue: Walking makes you uncomfortable? Try using teleport instead.
Even inslults feel more real in VR. Be considerate in a online enviroment.
Consider using a 3D headset for complete sensory immersion.
Don't remove your glasses! Most VR devices were designed with the visually impaired in mind.
Make sure you are running at a appropriate framerate. Inconsistent performance can cause nausia.
Make sure you have enough room to spread your arms around. You don't whant to karate chop your coffe cup.
